name: Fidget Trading Tycoon
description:
Can you collect ALL of the fidget toys 3d?

Fidget Trading Tycoon is a fun trading simulation game where you trade and collect different 3d fidget toys. Make profitable trades and become an Trading Master of Fidget Toys. Play with a great number of fidgets. Are you ready to become the most relaxed fidget billionaire in the world?

Select fidget from your inventory and start trading. If you and opponent all agree on the deal push the tick button to complete the trade. If you want to reject simply push the cross button to decline the trade. Get more items from your opponent with the plus button. Develop your trading techniques.

Fidgets are so relaxing and cool, they pack endless amount of fun just like Fidget Trading 3D!

Grow your inventory and be the Trading Master!
